content: wrap your little one in warmth and whimsy with this knit goose scarf stitched in a combination of bernat blanket and bernat super value you ll practice chain decreases half_double_crochet half_double_crochet 2 together single_crochet and more to bring life to this project send your child off to school in the playful style of this unique accessory materials bernat® blanket™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m contrast a vintage white 10006 1 ball or 138 yds/126 m bernat® super value™ 7 oz/197 g 440 yds/402 m contrast b bright yellow 00608 1 ball or 35 yds/32 m gauges bernat® blanket™ 7 half_double_crochet and 7 row = 4 10 cm with larger hook bernat® super value™ 10 single_crochet and 11 row = 4 10 cm on smaller hook with 2 strands of yarn held together measurements approx 7 18 cm wide x 52 132 cm long
